tests.title: Verificar Botón de Donar
tests.fullTitle: Test sobre la pagina YVYTU Verificar Botón de Donar
tests.code:
YvytuHome.getGenericButton().contains("Donar").should("have.attr", "href", "https://cafecito.app/reserva-yvytu").and("have.attr", "target", "_blank");
YvytuHome.getGenericButton().contains("Donar").should("have.css", "Background", "rgb(34, 153, 84) none repeat scroll 0% 0% / auto padding-box border-box");
